ModMetaData.name: Panzerwerfer 42 auf Maultier (Sd.Kfz. 4/1)
ModMetaData.author: LastRegress
ModMetaData.description: The Panzerwerfer 42 auf Maultier (Sd.Kfz. 4/1) (Armoured Mortar) is a converted variant of the Maultier half-track. First put into production in 1943 as an armoured cross country vehicle carrying a modified version of the 15cm Nebelwerfer 41. The vehicle's weight was increased to 7.1 tonnes from 3.9-5.5 tonnes of the unmodified Maultier. The vehicle fired 15cm rockets that were spin stabilized, the propellant was placed at the front of the rocket with the explosives at the rear, this allowed them to detonate just above the ground.
